agenda.description: ** REVISION ** HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF FORMAL MEETING COMMITTEE: Appropriations - S/C on Article II TIME & DATE: 2:00 PM or upon final adjourn./recess or bill referral, if permission granted Tuesday, February 26, 2019 PLACE: JHR 131 CHAIR: Rep. Sarah Davis PLEASE NOTE TIME CHANGE The Appropriations Subcommittee on Article II will meet in a formal meeting to discuss House budget items related to Article II. The Subcommittee will be working on the Health and Human Services Commission, the Texas Civil Commitment Office, and the Office of the Inspector General. As a reminder no public or agency testimony may be taken during a formal meeting. ** See Committee Coordinator for previous versions ** of the schedule, if applicable.
